body.name: Libman 906 Dust Pan with Whisk Broom
features: Whisk Broom snaps into a Libman dustpan for easy and convenient storage
The fine fibers help to better pick up hair, dust, and dirt better than traditional small-job brooms
The sturdy, flagged duster fibers are made from recycled materials in environmentally friendly manufacturing facilities
10.5" total whisk height with a 7" wide sweeping surface. Comes with a 10.25" wide dustpan
Quality made in the USA since 1896
body.description: Heavy-Duty, super-durable polypropelyne construction is what allows the Libman Household Dustpan to stand out among the rest when collecting dirt and debris. The oversized, deep well holds more dirt and accepts all standard sized brooms to make this dustpan the perfect combo to the Libman Whisk Broom. The Whisk Broom features 7" of sweeping space, and split tip fibers made from recycled water bottles. Excellent for quick pick-ups, the Libman Whisk Broom has more durability, and a longer life than your traditional whisk broom.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #74,160 in Industrial & Scientific (See Top 100 in Industrial & Scientific) #43 in Commercial Dustpans #213 in Household Dustpans

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect size & Color
reviews.reviewText: It is so nice to find just the right size, perfect/fun color, that is so well made for quick and easy clean-ups, without getting the big broom and dustpan from another room. It is easy to store next to the refrigerator in the kitchen. I am going to buy two more for in the cabinets in the bathrooms. Talk about time-saver! Thank you!-

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s the perfect size and it’s very sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does it's job!
reviews.reviewText: This is a sturdy little whisk broom that gets the job done! The bristles are very full & sweep up messes without any fuss. The pan is very flat at the leading edge allowing the finest of dust to be fully swept onto it's surface. I'll never purchase another brand again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It is difficult to find a good whisk broom and this one is just that. We didn’t really need another dustpan but these interlock and work well … and the old dustpan was retired to the garage.This product arrived on time, in good condition and was just as described by the seller.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars WOW! AN UNEXPECTED GIFT!
reviews.reviewText: As soon as I used this, I literally wanted to stop and write this review! I've used so many of these little brooms and dust pans and never have I been so satisfied. I have old hard wood and dust collects everywhere so I find myself constantly cleaning. The stairs are always a challenge because most hand held brooms have flimsy brushes and dust particles go everywhere. Not only were these bristles great quality that held up, they also held in all the dust! I didn't have to tap it out once on the entire staircase! Another plus is that the pan doesn't have the rubber liner at the top of the pan, so in two swipes every piece on the floor was in the pan. I normally have to dampen a cloth to get the tiny pieces up. I can't believe I'm just discovering this...not that I expect it to wear any time soon, I will purchase this every time it does.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2022
reviews.reviewText: The pieces are made with a high quality plastic. Not cheaply made. The broom attached nicely to the dustpan. It’s nice and compact to store in a small space. I put it under my kitchen sink where it’s handy to grab quickly to clean up messes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A little tank
reviews.reviewText: This is my second one. The red looks unique and artful in the house. These pieces are made well in hard backed rubber. White was better because I could clearly see what I am sweeping up … but red is nice, I will let the red one serve the house for a year or two and then go bank to white.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Products from an American Family-owned Company
reviews.reviewText: I am very happy with all my Libman brand brooms and dustpans, I have a few different styles. They are very long lasting and the dustpans are excellent. There is no rubber edge, so they do not fall apart. The edge on the dustpans are very well designed and collect the smallest debris. The brooms area nice weight and the dustpans are heavy duty. I support the quality products made by this great company.
